name: Blocky Rugby
description:
Grab your balls and run like mad in a fresh, fun rugby runner! Dodge tackles, score tries and kick conversions. How high can you score?

FEATURES
• Easy to play rugby fun
• Retro style blocky graphics
• Lots of characters
• Different pitches & weather effects
• Compete with friends
• Share your #Replay
